Text: ELIMINATE CREDIT CARD DEBTTradingpst Eliminate your credit card debt without filing bankruptcy Are you tired of making minimum payments and barely getting by Are you drowning in debt Are you ready for a change and some freedom What will buying this package do for me It will terminate your credit card debt Major credit cards only Not department store cards or gas cards This covers cash advances This covers unsecured loans as well It will allow you to stop making monthly payments immediately It will empower you to take back the control of your life Unlike bankruptcy this keeps your affairs completely private Only you the creditors and the credit bureau will know However you will not lose your home or any other assets You will no longer be able to use those credit cards The price of this package runs between This depends on if you want to do it yourself or with the aid of an paralegal We offer a guarantee too This program has been used successfully for years For more information please call Ext This works in the US ONLY To opt out of our mailing list simply reply to this email
